title: unesco_heritage_Jesuit_Missions_of_La_Santísima_Trinidad_de_Paraná_and_Jesús_de_Tavarangue
text:
Name: Jesuit Missions of La Santísima Trinidad de Paraná and Jesús de Tavarangue. short_description:

In addition to their artistic interest, these missions are a reminder of the Jesuits' Christianization of the Río de la Plata basin in the 17th and 18th centuries, with the accompanying social and economic initiatives.

. date_inscribed: 1993. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: -55.702672. latitude: -27.131613. area_hectares: 27.88. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Paraguay. Region: Latin America and the Caribbean. iso_code: py. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
